(2/3) The renegotiation is not mission impossible. With patience and goodwill, a deal can be done.

I oppose Cameron's views on the future of Europe. What he proposes is the Europe of deregulation and competition.
David Cameron wants the benefits of Europe without homework. What he is asking for is less Europe, a Europe without a future.
We call on the Belgian Government to firmly oppose David Cameron's reductive and nationalist vision of the European Union.
This morning the PM gave a #chspeech on Europe and #EUreform. Read the full speech here: https://t.co/0slAFdnThN
Helmut Schmidt was a great German statesman, a social democrat and a great European who has always enlightened the public debate.
David Cameron on Europe's future. What he is proposing is a Europe of deregulation and competition.
David Cameron wants the benefits of the EU without the responsibilities. He demands less Europe, a Europe without a future.
We ask the Belgian government to firmly oppose itself to David Cameron's reductive and nationalist vision of the European Union.

I have now opened #VallettaSummit to discuss migration. Number of people on the move has never been so big. Africa & Europe under pressure
#VallettaSummit to agree joint African-European approach & concrete steps in five areas:
RT @philip_rye: Danish PM: Danish exports to the US could increase by up to 14% with an ambitious TTIP agreement #NordicTTIP https: //t.co...

One: Address root causes of migration.
Two: Legal migration to remain open. Mobility a driver of growth in both continents.
Three: Prevent trafficking of migrants by criminal gangs whose only motive is profit.
Four: Support displaced people in Africa & offer international protection to those entitled.
Wishing a #HappyDiwali to the entire Hindu community in Tanzania. Let's go be the light. #SoteNiNdugu
Five: Return of those not entitled to international protection. To keep doors open for refugees & legal migrants.
Voluntary return always preferable. But when not possible, non-voluntary return is pre-requisite for well-managed migration policy
